RUN_TIMESTAMP.description: last action/modification on this record in the local source system YYYYMMDDHH24MISS

CUSTOMER_SOURCE_UNIQUE_ID.description: Unique ID of the customer in the local source system

ORGUNIT_CODE.description: Organisational unit of the AXA Entity to be given by AML team in the Inception phase

FIRST_NAME.description: If customer is Personal - FIRST_NAME of Customer. If customer is non personal this is NULL.

LAST_NAME.description: If customer is Personal - LAST_NAME of Customer. If customer is non Personal only LAST_NAME is populated, FIRST_NAME is NULL.

SUFFIX.description: Any suffixes following the individuals name. E.g.: III or Junior or Senior

CUSTOMER_NAME.description: For Retail Customers: Full Name of the Customer. Concatenation of FIRST_NAME, Middle Names and LAST_NAME. For Corporate Customers: Name of company, same as in COMPANY_NAME field. Used in WLM for alert generation and investigation as well as Alert Investigation in AMM.

COMPANY_NAME.description: If Business/Corporate - Name of company, same as in CUSTOMER_NAME field

COMPANY_FORM.description: Only for Corporate Customers. Type of company or legal form , must be one of the codes included in the LV - Company Form tab. Is used in CRR as a Risk Factor.

REGISTERED_NUMBER.description: If Customer is Business – Registered no of company

INCORPORATION_DATE.description: If Business/Corporate - Date the company was Incorporated

INCORPORATION_COUNTRY_CODE.description: Only for Corporate Customers. ISO Country Code where the company has been registered. Check the Ref. Tab COUNTRY

BUSINESS_SEGMENT_2.description: Further business segment classification In CDD detection this field is available as data source field, as a placeholder for further categorising the business of a corporate customer, but is not used in risk assessment scenarios.In EIM Framework this field is used in Full Customer Details screen as Secondary Activity. The field value is exposed as is, no descriptionlookup is foreseen.

DATE_OF_BIRTH.description: Only for Retail Customers: Date of Birth. For Corporate Customers should be sent eptyUsed in the WLM checks Not feeding this data will increase the number of false positives

NAME_OF_BIRTH.description: Name of Birth or Maiden name for Female

ADDRESS.description: Full address of the customer. Used in WLM for Alert Investigation. Used in AMM for Alert Investigation.

ZONE.description: Province of address of the customer. It must match one of the codes included in the LV - Provnce tab

CITY.description: City of the Customer’s main address

POSTAL_CODE.description: Postal Code of the Customer’s main

COUNTRY_OF_RESIDENCE.description: Only for Retail Customers. ISO Country Code of the Address of the customer (Not tax residence). It must be in ISO 3166 Alpha-2 Code format. Check the Ref. Tab COUNTRY to view all codifications

COUNTRY_OF_ORIGIN.description: Only for Retail Customers. ISO Country Code of the Country of Birth. It must be in ISO 3166 Alpha-2 Code format. Check the Ref. Tab COUNTRY

NATIONALITY_CODE.description: Only for Retail Customers. ISO Country Code of the Nationality of the customer. It must be in ISO 3166 Alpha-2 Code format. Check the Ref. Tab COUNTRY

PLACE_OF_BIRTH.description: Place that the customer was born

GENDER_CODE.description: Only for retail customers used to identify the gender GN001: Male GN002: Female GN003: UnknownEmpty for corporate customers.

EMPLOYEE_FLAG.description: Flag to indicate the customer is an employee of the AXA local entity. (Y/N)

OCCUPATION.description: Only for Retail Customers. Customer occupation or professional activity. It must be one of the codes included in the tab Profile - occupation

CANCELLED_DATE.description: Date in which the customer has no longer more relationship with the AXA Entity

CUSTOMER_TYPE_CODE.description: Type of Customer, possible values are Corporate or Retail. Check the Ref.Tab Customer Type tab to see possible values and its codification

CUSTOMER_STATUS_CODE.description: Status of the Customer. The possible values and codification are defined in the Ref. Tab Customer Status

RESIDENCE_FLAG.description: Flag to indicate the customer is a resident in the country of the AXA local entity. (Y/N)

SPECIAL_ATTENTION_FLAG.description: If this customer needs to be flagged or monitored by any special reason

DECEASED_FLAG.description: Flag to indicate if the customer is deceased. (Y/N)

COMPLEX_STRUCTURE.description: Flag to indicate if corporate customer is displaying a complex structure. (Y/N)

BLACK_LISTED_FLAG.description: Flag to indicate the Customer is on a black list. (Y/N)

TAX_NUMBER.description: Customers Tax Number used for tax purposes e.g., SSN, TIN, NI Number, TFN etc

TAX_NUMBER_ISSUED_BY.description: Country which issued the Customer s Tax Number used for tax purposes e.g., SSN, TIN, NI Number, TFN etc

CUSTOMER_CATEGORY_CODE.description: Field for additional information about segmentation of customer Ref RETAIL

ADDRESS_VALID_FROM.description: The earliest timestamp this address has been associated to this customer

ADDRESS_VALID_TO.description: The latest timestamp this address has been associated to this customer

EMAIL_VALID_FROM.description: The earliest timestamp this main email address has been associated to this customer

EMAIL_VALID_TO.description: The latest timestamp this main email address has been associated to this customer

PHONE_VALID_FROM.description: The earliest timestamp this main phone has been associated to this customer

PHONE_VALID_TO.description: The latest timestamp this main phone has been associated to this customer

TAX_NUMBER_TYPE.description: Customers Tax Number Type e.g., SSN, TIN, NI Number, TFN etc

COUNTRY_OF_HQ.description: Only for Corporate Customers. ISO Country Code of the country where the headquarters of the entity is located. Check the Ref. Tab COUNTRY

COUNTRY_OF_TAX_RESIDENCE.description: Only for Retail Customers. ISO Country Code of the Country of Tax Residence

NATIONALITY_CODE_2.description: Only for Retail Customers. ISO Country Code of the secondary nationality of the customer

CUSTOMER_IDENTIFICATION.description: JSON Array with all attributes for the customer identification.

IDENTIFICATION_NUMBER.description: Value   on   Identity   document,  e.g.  Passport number, TAX ID, Drivers Licence number. Not the Type of Document, the value of the document

ISSUING_AUTHORITY.description: Issuing  authority  or  territory where the id document  is from

COUNTRY_CODE.description: ISO Country Code of the issuing country of the document Ref COUNTRY

IDENTIFICATION_TYPE.description: Type  of  ID  e.g.  Passport/Tax  ID.  Must  be one   of   codes   defined   in   the   table Identification types

VALID_FROM.description: The unique identifier for a product

VALID_TO.description: The unique identifier for a product

X_SOURCE_SYSTEM.description: Source system from where the party is originated from

X_OLD_CUSTOMER_SOURCE_UNIQUE_ID.description: This field is informative field for potential tracability, In case of record is detected changing from old ID to new ID, the new record needs to be sent with this field filled with old ID

X_NEW_CUSTOMER_SOURCE_UNIQUE_ID.description: This field is informative field for potential tracability in case of record is detected changing from old ID to new ID, the old record needs to be sent with this field filled with the new id (this old record normally needs to have X_SCREENING_DATE filled)

X_CUSTOMER_INTERMEDIARY_REF_ID.description: Your intermediary source ID, for future use

X_SCREENING_END_DATE.description: Date of end of screening of this record, needs to be = sysdate or in the future

BUSINESSES_SEGMENT_1_1.description: Each of the different values provided for BUSINESS_SEGMENT_1. N is the sequential number of each value.

MARITAL_STATUS.description: If personal/individual customer - Marital Status Code. LOOKUP table dictionary.

COUNTRY_OF_OPERATIONS_1.description: Each of the different values provided for COUNTRY_OF_OEPRATIONS. N is the sequential number of each value.

OCCUPATION_1.description: Each of the different values provided for OCCUPATION. N is the sequential number of each value.
